context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute and manage bulk operations within the system to enhance their efficiency.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Increased efficiency in handling operations
description: Allows power users to execute and manage bulk operations for increased efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to perform bulk operations.
postconditions: Bulk operations are successfully executed and managed.
assumptions: The power user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
The system is operational and capable of handling bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations.
The system shall authenticate users before allowing access to bulk operations.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations that can be performed.
main_flow: 1. Power user requests to authenticate → System verifies user credentials.
2. Power user initiates bulk operations → System executes the requested bulk operations.
3. System confirms successful execution of bulk operations → Power user receives confirmation.
